title: How to improve champ select for blind pick - Would appreciate a riot response
body:
Everybody has encountered the common issue of players connecting at different times into champ select, this results in teams that mistrust eachother and fight over lanes. 
My proposal - When everybody enters champ select there is a 5 second lock on the chat box, this gives everybody a chance to join and everybody can race to call lanes at the same time without connection coming into play. 

Just a thought

replies.body:
For everybody saying just use teambuilder or use draft the entire point was to fix blind picks obvious flaw, yes people will troll but it does fix one problem that is a common issue. Just using a different que is avoiding the problem.

after the 5 sec why not have a button for each lane (like a game show, first to press the button gets to answer the question) and if you press the button it appears beside your name and greys out, then instead of first to copy/paste its first to press a button, and seeming only one person can press each lane there will be no fighting over who called.
That won't stop people from picking another role, instalocking a champion and continuing to go to the lane they originally wanted, even though it had been called.

People do that already regardless even in team builder I have seen trolls do that, what it does solve are those long arguments of "I called you joined late" "guys who called, me or him" and by the end of it no one has selected a champ and someone quickly selects another role that they didn't realise was already taken too
It solves the 'who called' problem

or if you really have that issue so often play team builder or maybe get a better comp.......

or even play with a full group so you get the role you want?{{summoner:14}}

^ This.

While yes, it is frustrating when people fight over lanes and the chat seems to cause it...

I believe the truth is that most of the time the argument is caused by the children arguing.

So playing with a full group of people you know aren't mentally twelve is the answer, not trying to fix Riot's 'broken' system.
Also helps if they arent ribbon mains.

How about instead of having Ranked as a Blind Pick, Turn it into a Team Builder like thing, all you need to do is select the Role you're gonna play (eg. Tank-Top) and then queue up for a team that needs a top laner, or make it a standard pool that matches up for the average solo-jungle-solo-duo lanes. There, bans can be carried out and champs selected as usual. Everyone will be on the same page and being Ranked you should play what you select.
I know there is teambuilder, I am talking about blind pick. They are 2 different ques, also a majority of the population plays blind pick.
"lets make blind pick...into exactly the same as TB"
call order is a bad idea. if you want a specific lane, go play teambuilder.

* 5 second lock >as suggested
* Disable Copy & Paste
* Enter Captcha or answer some easy question like maths addition  (debatable) 
* *Building on what "Lord Sesshomaru" said,* Buttons for different lanes, once clicked is greyed out for other players and shows a confirmation screen with maybe a timer (like shown when joining a game i.e. that little window with Accept & Decline)
*after all, positions taken, enable actual champ select.

Probably clicking a position rather than typing out your pref / instalocking is fairer since typing speed > click
Though then again I reckon Riot strives for usability and may just say all this overcomplicates it LOL
There'd literally be no harm in doing this too. So I support this.

That's why there is team builder :P
Though ultimately it's best to improve your skills by learning to play different lanes and champions.
